name: Gran Mortalidad
description:
It's a small game on a little girl that needs to reach the refuge.

Move the rooms to advance through the levels.

Be careful of the infected rooms because the darkness can spread.

+15 levels.

Gamepad support.

-----------------------------Credits-----------------------------

Design and Programming: Piero Diaz

Art: Cristobal Robles

Music: Felipe Ibacache

Logo: Valeria Salazar

Thanks to TreeCastle for the support.

And Angelica Guarnieri for the translation.
